Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hi TimeTeller,  Thank you for your kind message. We appreciate your support.  We actually have clients already and have existing revenue. Kindly see below one of the testimonials as well:  https://twitter.com/ViRehab/status/1135986515471978503  Moreover, please find below our NASDAQ interview with Jane King:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gvLMVF2WVgE  Virtual Rehab has actually been operating since 2017 and we have a series of global awards and recognition:  - Evidence-based solution with proven efficacy results approved by physicians, psychologists, and therapists - 87% of participating patients have shown an overall improvement across various metrics - Described by US Digital Government Head as a “capability that is very very promising for public services” - Only VR/AI company included in the US Department of Justice, Institute of Corrections Environmental Scan report (2017) - Partnership agreements in-place across the North America, Europe, Middle East, and APAC regions - Only company to represent Canada as part of the Canadian Delegation to Arab Health (2018) - Selected as one of Canada’s most promising high-growth life sciences companies - Featured by Microsoft’s leadership team at the Microsoft Inspire Innovation Session - Nominated by The Wall Street Journal for the WSJ D.LIVE Startup Showcase - Ranked by Spanish media as the first option for training correctional officers and rehabilitation of offenders using virtual reality - Founder awarded with the "Expert" status by the United Nations Global Sustainable Consumption & Production (SCP) Programme with focus on Sustainable Lifestyle and Education - Selected as one of the top innovative companies in Montreal, Quebec, Canada and will be included within the Montreal Innovation Ecosystem publication - Ranked 1st in “Top 10 To Watch” by England’s 21Cryptos Magazine - Nominated for the 2019 Global Health and Pharmaceuticals Awards - Featured by the media across 28 countries worldwide  We have pulled together an extensive Q&A should you be interested in learning more  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/everything-you-wanted-to-know-about-virtual-rehab-but-was-afraid-to-ask-56aa5f3a9b26  Please also find below our guide for getting ready for our upcoming Public Sale on Liquid Exchange:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/how-to-get-ready-for-the-upcoming-virtual-rehab-public-sale-on-liquid-a3c862a50f28  Hope this answers your questions. Happy to answer any additional ones you may have.  Regards

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hi tippytoes,  Thank you for your message and for your great question.  Virtual Rehab was incepted back in 2017. We already have customers using our solution. We have been operating in the Business-to-Business (B2B) space since our launch offering our services to hospitals, rehab centers, and correctional facilities.  We are now extending our offering to the end users directly through the use of the blockchain for added security and data privacy along with incentivizing users to take care of their mental health and psychological well-being. This has been in demand by our customers for quite some time now. However, we have taken our time to ensure that the solution we pursued was a very reliable one while ensuring HIPAA compliance.  For additional detail about the use of blockchain as part of our solution, please refer to the Medium article below:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/why-does-virtual-rehab-need-a-blockchain-1df016b37612  Along with being nominated for the 2019 Global Healthcare and Pharmaceuticals Awards, please find below some of our global awards and recognition:  https://twitter.com/ViRehab/status/1150068198605303808  In addition, kindly see below our interview with NASDAQ's Jane King regarding our existing and our future operations:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gvLMVF2WVgE  Virtual Rehab has been featured by Nasdaq MarketSite Tech Report alongside Amazon, Google, and others:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d-laOa11iTI  Hope this addresses your question. Thanks again for your support.  Regards

Author: Bitkocha
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Is the VRH service token intended for special use inside the platform only? And what reward can  get using it?

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello Bitkocha,  Thank you for your comment and for the great question. Much appreciated.  The VRH token is intended for the following use cases:  1- Allows users to order and download programs from Virtual Rehab Online Portal 2- Allows users to request additional analysis (using Virtual Rehab unique expert system, which uses Artificial Intelligence) of executed programs 3- Incentivizes users with VRH tokens reward for using our Virtual Rehab solution AND seeking help and counselling from medical doctors, psychologists, and therapists (Proof of Therapy) 4- Allows users to acquire services received at the Virtual Rehab Therapy Center (VRTC)  More information can be found around this and the incentive program (Proof of Therapy) in the below Medium article:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/why-does-virtual-rehab-need-a-blockchain-1df016b37612  Kindly also note that we have partnered with Pundi X and VRH will be available on their XWallet. For more detail about the use, please refer to the Medium article below:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/integrating-pundi-x-as-part-of-the-virtual-rehab-solution-75718c08e9c7  For additional questions about Virtual Rehab, kindly refer to the below Medium article which has one of the most extensive Q&As out there:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/everything-you-wanted-to-know-about-virtual-rehab-but-was-afraid-to-ask-56aa5f3a9b26  Thank you once again for your question and for your support.  Regards

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hi Tumis,  Hope you are well.  It is quite unfortunate that you have been threatening us for quite some time right now with no action. If you wish to proceed with taking action, please do so. We are ready to take you heads-on, as you would like us to bypass laws and regulations, and do an exception just for you, in order to receive your tokens.  Although we appreciate your hard work, it would be very unfair for us to make an exception to someone who decided to ask about whether he can complete the KYC several months after the end of the KYC allotted period.  When dealing with professional and well-reputable companies, you should NEVER ask them to treat you special or feel entitled for a treatment different than everyone else. When there is a deadline, you MUST adhere to it, otherwise, it would be your loss.  The fact that you were late not days, not weeks, but months after the end of the deadline is just unacceptable.  Now, to state facts correctly, and avoid misleading the community, here is a timeline of events:  1- The Bounty was kicked-off on July 22, 2018  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4722261.0  2- Following legal request, we advised the community 2 weeks later that KYC/AML is a requirement. We had it in BOLD on top of the page and wrote an article about why we were doing this.  https://www.virtualrehab.co/why-kyc-bounty-participants/  3- We gave everyone a deadline of December 14th 2018 to complete all KYC/AML - so you had 5 MONTHS AND 8 DAYS to complete KYC/AML  4- Those who completed it by the deadline were eligible for the award. Those who didn't missed the award and they accepted it since they knew they had plenty of time.  5- YOU decided to come after the Virtual Rehab team begging us to allow you to do KYC/AML on May 21st 2019 (ALMOST 6 MONTHS AFTER END OF DEADLINE) This is unacceptable.  6- NOW you are coming back begging again for us to allow you to do KYC/AML and the answer is NO. No exceptions for you, when others have complied  Our Telegram chat history clearly shows the numerous times we have been asking all bounty participants to complete KYC. We have also announced this numerously on Twitter, Medium, Google+, Website, Facebook, LinkedIn, yet all of these forums went all unnoticed. Where have you been?  You also state that we did not provide you with any reasons. Well since you have gone public with this, below are our exchanges with you:  ============================================================================================  MAY 21st 2019  Hello Tumis,  The KYC was introduced a couple of weeks later from the commencement of the campaign since we received many fake translations and many fake participants.  We verified the time you were assigned the task and that came after the announcement of the KYC, so you should have been aware. Plus you had many months to complete. Unfortunately, you are 6 months late to complain about this.  Below are the articles we issued on Medium with respect to this topic. The process was very clear and very transparent. It would be unfair for us to make any exceptions when many people followed the rules and submitted everything on-time.  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/why-kyc-bounty-participants-3a591862d97c (August 12, 2018)  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/virtual-rehab-kyc-aml-guide-c21b297c3f53 (October 3, 2018)  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/attention-to-all-bounty-hunters-kyc-process-deadline-c60fd0dc8395 (November 19, 2018)  May 22, 2019  Hello tumis,  We understand your frustration and indeed, it is quite unfortunate to have many scams out there. Unfortunately, that's part of dealing with companies with no measurable results and only an idea or a vision.  It seems that you might not know who Virtual Rehab is?  Some of our notable successes include the following:  - Evidence-based solution with proven efficacy results approved by physicians, psychologists, and therapists - 87% of participating patients have shown an overall improvement across various metrics - Described by US Digital Government Head as a “capability that is very very promising for public services” - Only VR/AI company included in the US Department of Justice, Institute of Corrections Environmental Scan report - Partnership agreements in-place across the North America, Europe, Middle East, and APAC regions - Only company to represent Canada as part of the Canadian Delegation to Arab Health - Selected as one of Canada’s most promising high-growth life sciences companies - Featured by Microsoft’s leadership team at the Microsoft Inspire Innovation Session - Nominated by The Wall Street Journal for the WSJ D.LIVE Startup Showcase - Ranked by Spanish media as the first option for training correctional officers and rehabilitation of offenders using virtual reality - Founder awarded with the "Expert" status by the United Nations Global Sustainable Consumption & Production (SCP) Programme with focus on Sustainable Lifestyle and Education - Selected as one of the top innovative companies in Montreal, Quebec, Canada and will be included within the Montreal Innovation Ecosystem publication - Ranked 1st in “Top 10 To Watch” by England’s 21Cryptos Magazine – the leading Cryptocurrency and Blockchain magazine, with monthly content from dozens of the industry's experts, public figures, and traders - Featured by the media across 28 countries worldwide  Therefore, calling us a scam would not go a long way.  Feel free to do as you deem appropriate. We will be ready for any action with another counter-action to ensure that government authorities or any party to that concern has clear background and evidence about all interactions.  KYC is a LEGAL requirement and failing to do so is your decision not ours. Yes, we have introduced it a couple of weeks later and yes, we advised everyone who is not happy with this decision to immediately stop working.  You are 6 months late from our last communication and no, we will not make any exception for you, since it would not be fair to others who 100% were compliant with our requirements.  Thank you.  May 23, 2019  Tumis,  This is our final communication on this topic (we can no longer deal with your hostility when you know you are wrong) and you are free to pursue whatever action you wish to make. We are prepared as we have given this enough attention and we simply cannot accommodate your lack of attention to detail and wanting us to do you a favor when others met the rules and you failed to do so, since you were not existent for many months and now you are remembering about this. We would be a scam if we accommodated your request and failed many other participants who worked hard and followed all the proper instructions. Those who didn't, unfortunately, will not be compensated.  Please do proper research before you speak none sense due to personal frustration. Virtual Rehab has been out there for a couple of years already. We have already helped many people and our work, global awards. and recognition speak for themselves. You may wish to do more research so as not to fall privy to scams out there. In addition, we advise you to follow instructions and follow regularly on tasks and rules which have been shared for many months.  Below are the articles included once again for all of our communication:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/why-kyc-bounty-participants-3a591862d97c (August 12, 2018)  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/virtual-rehab-kyc-aml-guide-c21b297c3f53 (October 3, 2018)  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/attention-to-all-bounty-hunters-kyc-process-deadline-c60fd0dc8395 (November 19, 2018)  We wish you the best of luck.  May 24, 2019  Tumis,  Happy to answer your questions and will end it there as your questions clearly demonstrate that you have not done your homework well.  1) Jean-Francois Tremblay - Virtual Rehab  2) The bounty campaign was listed on July 22nd. KYC was enforced on August 12. 3 weeks later. Details are below:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/why-kyc-bounty-participants-3a591862d97c  3) KYC participants had until December 14th to complete their submission. 5 MONTHS NOT 3 weeks.   And if you are anywhere in the world, ESPECIALLY the US, you will understand that it is ILLEGAL not to do KYC.  Sorry you feel it's unfair. and sorry you had to go through this. We wish you best of luck whichever way you decide to proceed. Thank you for your messages.  ===================================================================================================  We leave the judgment now to the public. We hate to do this. However, if you decide to solicit our reputation, we will have no other choice but to expose our communication. This will be brought to the appropriate authorities as well (when and if needed)  Your threats are unacceptable and we are more than happy to pursue any legal action you may raise and moreover, we will add to that solicitation of reputation.  Unfortunately, it seems that you feel entitled for a special treatment, which we shall not adhere to nor accept.  We are thankful for your efforts and are sorry that you did not follow the rules like everyone else who did.  We wish you the best of luck !

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hi Lucky-marsik,  Thank you for stopping by and for the question.  The solution is not for treatment by a virtual doctor - far from that actually.  Virtual Rehab's evidence-based solution leverages the advancements in virtual reality, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technologies for psychological rehabilitation of vulnerable populations (pain management, prevention of substance use disorders, enhancement of autistic individuals’ communication skills, and rehabilitation of repeat offenders). Established back in 2017, Virtual Rehab was first to commercialize the use of VR and AI for addiction and correctional rehabilitation. Virtual Rehab is regarded as an undisputed market leader within the sector in which it operates. The team has received global awards and recognition from the US and the Canadian governments, the United Nations, The Wall Street Journal, Microsoft, and others.  Virtual Rehab is a market leader for psychological rehabilitation of vulnerable populations. We have been operating in the B2B space (hospitals, rehab centers, correctional facilities) for the last 2 years and we are now looking to enter into the B2C space.  When dealing with the most vulnerable populations out there, privacy and security of information/data shared, become extremely important. Unfortunately, as of today, this information is publicly available and could be accessed through online databases which expose the identities of these vulnerable populations. As a result, this prevents these populations from re-integrating back into society and becoming an effective part of it as well.  Fortunately, this level of privacy/data protection can all be made possible when integrating blockchain technology as part of the Virtual Rehab solution. We will not gather the first name or the last name of these vulnerable populations — they will be associated with a wallet address. The only information which will be gathered are the age, gender, race, biometrics (heart rate, blood pressure, biodermal activity), and eye-tracking. This will ensure complete HIPAA compliance and anonymity of these vulnerable populations information/data.  Moreover, Virtual Rehab is solving an even bigger problem which is data sharing among medical institutions, correctional departments, researchers, and patients worldwide. As of today, this data cannot be accessed due to privacy and patient protection laws. However, with our Virtual Rehab solution, everyone will have access to this information, which is completely anonymous and would allow for a database of input data and metrics to be accessed, which can further enhance existing research in the area of mental health through the global collaboration of researchers and medical professionals from around the world. Patients will also be able to access this data and find some synergies or relations with their existing symptoms and attempt to apply some best practices accordingly.  In addition, The VRH utility token has four use cases:  - Allows users to order and download programs from Virtual Rehab Online Portal - Allows users to request additional analysis (using Virtual Rehab unique expert system, which uses Artificial Intelligence) of executed programs - Incentivizes users with $VRH tokens reward for seeking help and counselling from medical doctors, psychologists, and therapists (Proof of Therapy) - Allows users to pay for services received at the Virtual Rehab Therapy Center (VRTC)  Hope this clarifies. Happy to answer any other questions you may have.  Regards

Body: Hello tippytoes,  Hope you are well.  Great question. Thank you for asking.  To help put things in perspective, we are already providing those services on an average rate that is 60%-80% cheaper than the current pricing provided through traditional therapy. This is particularly when dealing with Business-to-Business (B2B) institutions (i.e. hospitals, rehab centers, correctional facilities, etc.)  Once we roll-out our Business-to-Consumer (B2C) offering, we are even more confident that we will provide these services at an even more economical rate than what is being offered through the traditional ways, which are, to your point quite costly, and cannot be afforded by the average person.  In addition, through our Virtual Rehab Therapy Centers (VRTC), we will provide an additional 20% discount on top of our sale price, should the patient decide to pay using the $VRH token.  Thank you once again for the question and for raising this very important point.  Regards

Body: Hello TonyHernan,  Thanks for the question.  Yes. Of course.  Our studies have been pretty successful thus far. Our results showed that 87% of participating patients have shown an overall improvement across 62 various metrics within the following six categories:  1- Problem Recognition & Acceptance 2- Openness to Change 3- Locus of Control 4- Decision-Making Influences 5- Emotional Intelligence & Regulation 6- Motivation & Resilience  Within the medical field, 87% is quite a high number and we are certainly looking forward to improve further upon that. Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Thanks CryptoTonyBTC for the continued support.  Having said that, everyone is entitled to their own opinion. In addition, given the number of scams out there, people are unfortunately becoming less and less trusting of the companies out there, so we can appreciate that.  However, what we can't appreciate is not doing any DD and categorizing companies all in the same bucket. Very simple research would demonstrate that Virtual Rehab is in a category all by itself, especially within this industry. In addition, why would we dilute our fund raise and potential investments to be received. That would only mean less cash to do all the heavy lifting and all the plans which we have in-place.  We were the first to introduce our solution in the addiction and the correction space back in 2017 and here we are doing it again by bringing blockchain to add a further level of security and privacy to patients so as to allow them to re-integrate back into society and become and effective part of it. Moreover, we are solving the issue of medical data record sharing across the world by anonymizing all the data and making it available for further research in the mental health area.  If the below list of awards don't speak for themselves, we aren't sure what does:  - Evidence-based solution with proven efficacy results approved by physicians, psychologists, and therapists - 87% of participating patients have shown an overall improvement across various metrics - Described by US Digital Government Head as a “capability that is very very promising for public services” - Only VR/AI company included in the US Department of Justice, Institute of Corrections Environmental Scan report - Partnership agreements in-place across the North America, Europe, Middle East, and APAC regions - Only company to represent Canada as part of the Canadian Delegation to Arab Health - Selected as one of Canada’s most promising high-growth life sciences companies - Featured by Microsoft’s leadership team at the Microsoft Inspire Innovation Session - Nominated by The Wall Street Journal for the WSJ D.LIVE Startup Showcase - Ranked by Spanish media as the first option for training correctional officers and rehabilitation of offenders using virtual reality - Founder awarded with the "Expert" status by the United Nations Global Sustainable Consumption & Production (SCP) Programme with focus on Sustainable Lifestyle and Education - Selected as one of the top innovative companies in Montreal, Quebec, Canada and will be included within the Montreal Innovation Ecosystem publication - Ranked 1st in “Top 10 To Watch” by England’s 21Cryptos Magazine – the leading Cryptocurrency and Blockchain magazine, with monthly content from dozens of the industry's experts, public figures, and traders - Featured by the media across 28 countries worldwide  Having said that, part of business is to welcome all feedback and comments with open arms and we shall continue to do so.  As for any proof or confirmation required outside of the smart contract or the blockchain, we are always happy to provide accordingly. We have always been extremely transparent and will continue to do so.  Thanks again for the continued support.  Regards

The Virtual Rehab Online Portal is a repository which contains all programs which are developed by the Virtual Rehab team (and reviewed and approved by medical doctors, psychologists, or therapists prior to deploying them to our clients). It also includes all the data which has been collected from the Virtual Rehab experience executed by the users. Hope this provides further insight.  Regards

Author: TonyHernan
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Understood.  This is all fascinating but why do you need blockchain for your project?

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello TonyHernan,  We have actually written an extensive article around this. Please see URL below:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/why-does-virtual-rehab-need-a-blockchain-1df016b37612  In a nutshell, the blockchain will first allow Virtual Rehab to enter into the consumer market.  Furthermore, when dealing with the most vulnerable populations out there, privacy and security of information/data shared, become extremely important. Unfortunately, as of today, this information is publicly available and could be accessed through online databases which expose the identities of these vulnerable populations. As a result, this prevents these populations from re-integrating back into society and becoming an effective part of it as well.  Fortunately, this level of privacy/data protection can all be made possible when integrating blockchain technology as part of the Virtual Rehab solution. We will not gather the first name or the last name of these vulnerable populations — they will be associated with a wallet address. The only information which will be gathered are the age, gender, race, biometrics (heart rate, blood pressure, biodermal activity), and eye-tracking. This will ensure complete HIPAA compliance and anonymity of these vulnerable populations information/data.  Moreover, Virtual Rehab is solving an even bigger problem which is data sharing among medical institutions, correctional departments, researchers, and patients worldwide. As of today, this data cannot be accessed due to privacy and patient protection laws. However, with our Virtual Rehab solution, everyone will have access to this information, which is completely anonymous and would allow for a database of input data and metrics to be accessed, which can further enhance existing research in the area of mental health through the global collaboration of researchers and medical professionals from around the world. Patients will also be able to access this data and find some synergies or relations with their existing symptoms and attempt to apply some best practices accordingly.  Hope this explains things better. Sorry for the long response.  Regards

Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥

Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Just curious,  how can you use virtual rehab's solution for addiction treatment?

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello TonyHernan,  Thanks for your question.  Virtual Rehab’s solution is used as a preventative tool from relapsing back into addiction. Using real-life virtual simulation, users are subjected heads-on with their cravings. Leveraging cognitive behavior and exposure therapy, users are presented with stimuli (i.e. cues or triggers), such as an alcohol bottle or a drug syringe or similar stimuli, where as a physician, a psychologist, or a therapist, you can monitor the patients’ behavior and decision-making accordingly.  Hope this clarifies.  Regards

Author: mindrust
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: I didn't quite understand what this coin is about.  Is this a company share or does this coin actually do something? (other than p&d, buy stuff, speculate) From what I see, apparently it is not a currency. If it is not a currency, then what is it?  From your whitepaper:     Hmm. Blockchain and psychological rehabilitation. OK. I didn't quite understand. But let's read it anyway.  Quote The disclosed technology includes services in a telemedicine context and can extend to individual users of the Virtual Rehab solution to serve the B2C market, in addition to hospitals, rehab centers, correctional facilities, correctional officers, inmates, etc. to serve the B2B market. Furthermore, using blockchain technology, we can now reach out to those vulnerable populations directly, to offer help and reward, by empowering them with the use of Virtual Rehab's ERC-20 VRH Token within our network.  How the hell are you planning to reach vulnerable populations directly by using blockchain?  Let's say I am one of those vulnerable people and I bought these tokens to heal myself, how is it going to affect my health? Are you going to send your doctors to my house? "Help and Reward?" I thought you were going to help me since I already bought the tokens. (already paid the price for the service) Am I going to heal myself by watching the price chart Now? That sounds great tbh. I don't have any problems with that If the token goes up up up up and fckn UP forever and heals the whole world.    Read further and further, many technical stuff I am not interested in... btw, I am only interested in what this coin is about. Don't care about the rehabilitation stuff. We already got professionals for that.  Anyway kept reading and reading still wondering what this token is about aaaand I finally reached the last part...  Quote VRH TOKEN  The Virtual Rehab Token (VRH) has been created as a centralized currency to be used within the Virtual Rehab network. Users will be able to purchase and sell VRH tokens in exchanges.  BAM. Wohoo.    So I was right.  If you have such a great idea about rehabilitating people... Why don't you just open a rehabilitation center (or a website since you are talking about virtual reality stuff) and sell your services for Bitcoins?  CONCLUSION  Sorry but your project is a piece of shit and a SCAM.    I made this review because VirtualRehab kindly asked for it me via PM. I hope he enjoys it.

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hi mindrust,  Thank you for your comments. Much appreciated.  Hopefully, the explanation below will put things further in perspective as your questions are quite valid.  So, what is the utility of the VRH token?  In a nutshell, the VRH token is an ERC20 utility token that empowers users to purchase services and to be rewarded for seeking help through Virtual Rehab’s online portal.  What does that actually mean?  The VRH utility token has four use cases:  - Allows users to order and download programs from Virtual Rehab Online Portal - Allows users to request additional analysis (using Virtual Rehab unique expert system, which uses Artificial Intelligence) of executed programs - Incentivizes users with VRH tokens reward for seeking help and counselling from medical doctors, psychologists, and therapists (Proof of Therapy) - Allows users to pay for services received at the Virtual Rehab Therapy Center (VRTC)  Delving a bit more on "Proof of Therapy"?  Users can either trade the VRH tokens on exchanges or they can use the VRH tokens to purchase more services from the Virtual Rehab Online Portal.  Now you may wonder, what if they just use the tokens to make money?  That is definitely a possibility. However, just like anything in life, we sometimes tend to do things which we are forced to do in the beginning, and then we get used to them afterwards.  This is no different. In fact, it is medically proven that the more and more someone gets in the habit of doing something, they become used to it after a while.  Therefore, in this case, by allowing (or forcing, depending on how you see it) the user to visit the medical doctor, psychologist, or therapist every now and then, the user will improve their mental health and psychological mindset, and will benefit from these sessions indirectly.   One of our keen investors is a therapist for soccer players and you know what he shared with us? He loved the "Proof of Therapy" since he shared with us that the best incentive that you can get a soccer player to lose a couple of pounds so that they remain in shape was to reward them with cash in order to stay in shape.  That's exactly what we are doing here. We are telling the patients to go out there and make use of our evidence-based programs (which has already proven its efficacy in the B2B world), AND seek help and counseling from medical professionals. Once they do that, and provide anonymous proofs that they have done so, they will be rewarded with VRH tokens, which they can re-use within the Virtual Rehab network to get more programs and more rehabilitation treatment.  We wrote an extensive and one of our most popular articles about Why Virtual Rehab Needs a Blockchain on Medium:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/why-does-virtual-rehab-need-a-blockchain-1df016b37612   If you delve further in the issue we have mindrust and the background of the problem, you will see where VRH comes in handy and blockchain in general.  When dealing with the most vulnerable populations out there, privacy and security of information/data shared, become extremely important. Unfortunately, as of today, this information is publicly available and could be accessed through online databases which expose the identities of these vulnerable populations. As a result, this prevents these populations from re-integrating back into society and becoming an effective part of it as well.  Fortunately, this level of privacy/data protection can all be made possible when integrating blockchain technology as part of the Virtual Rehab solution. We will not gather the first name or the last name of these vulnerable populations — they will be associated with a wallet address. The only information which will be gathered are the age, gender, race, biometrics (heart rate, blood pressure, biodermal activity), and eye-tracking. This will ensure complete HIPAA compliance and anonymity of these vulnerable populations information/data.  Moreover, Virtual Rehab is solving an even bigger problem which is data sharing among medical institutions, correctional departments, researchers, and patients worldwide. As of today, this data cannot be accessed due to privacy and patient protection laws. However, with our Virtual Rehab solution, everyone will have access to this information, which is completely anonymous and would allow for a database of input data and metrics to be accessed, which can further enhance existing research in the area of mental health through the global collaboration of researchers and medical professionals from around the world. Patients will also be able to access this data and find some synergies or relations with their existing symptoms and attempt to apply some best practices accordingly.   Moreover, since our inception back in 2017, we have led this transformation and are regarded as a market leader in what we do.  Some of our notable successes include the following:  - Evidence-based solution with proven efficacy results approved by physicians, psychologists, and therapists - 87% of participating patients have shown an overall improvement across various metrics - Described by US Digital Government Head as a “capability that is very very promising for public services” - Only VR/AI company included in the US Department of Justice, Institute of Corrections Environmental Scan report - Partnership agreements in-place across the North America, Europe, Middle East, and APAC regions - Only company to represent Canada as part of the Canadian Delegation to Arab Health - Selected as one of Canada’s most promising high-growth life sciences companies (Dose of the Valley, CA) - Featured by Microsoft’s leadership team at the Microsoft Inspire Innovation Session - Nominated by The Wall Street Journal for the WSJ D.LIVE Startup Showcase (Laguna Beach, CA) - Ranked by Spanish media as the first option for training correctional officers and rehabilitation of offenders using virtual reality - Founder awarded with the “Expert” status by the United Nations Global Sustainable Consumption & Production (SCP) Programme with focus on Sustainable Lifestyle and Education - Selected as one of the top innovative companies in Montreal, Quebec, Canada and will be included within the Montreal Innovation Ecosystem publication - Featured by the media across 28 countries   Hopefully, this puts things further in perspective.  Thank you once again for posing these excellent questions and for helping us clarify further.  Regards

The FDA has released a report (end of 2017) which proves that combining technology (in the form of apps) along with medication can result in a decreased rate of relapse (46.2%) compared to the traditional (16.7%). Our centers will be the very first to combine the best of both worlds worldwide.  The patient will, however, have the option to pay in VRH. Should they decide to pay in any other currency they will have to pay a premium. This will help further promote the utility of our tokens.  Why pay with VRH?  Due to the reasons shared in the previous responses.  Have a wonderful rest of your day.  Regards

Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Are there any studies or researches proving the efficacy of the use of virtual reality for rehabilitation?

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello CryptoTonyBTC,  Thank you for the question.  Please find below some of the researches which have been conducted which prove the efficacy of the virtual reality solution. There are way more than these and kindly refer to our white paper for an extensive list in the references section.  - Among 244 children (2–16 yrs. old) receiving vaccination, using VR resulted in 45% to 74% decrease in pain - Burn patients reported a 35% to 50% decrease in perceived pain when using VR with standard pharmacologic treatment - Researchers at Duke University are showing that when recovering people develop strategies to avoid relapse in a virtual world, they are able to take those strategies and use them in real-world situations - VR significantly reduced the amount of opioid medication administered during painful wound care procedures - VR can be used as a treatment tool for enhancing behavior modification goals to support healthy eating habits by reinforcing these goals in life–like situations  In fact, what people tend to forget is that virtual reality was first used back in 1994 by Kaiser Permanente to treat acrophobics (people who are afraid of heights) and the results were over 90% successful. Moreover, it was also used to treat returning veterans from Iraq and Afghanistan with Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) symptoms, and that was also over 75% successful. We are also seeing implementations for autism, lazy eye treatment, phobias, anxiety disorders, and other specialties as well.  Moreover, our results showed that 87% of participating patients have shown an overall improvement across 62 different metrics within the following categories:  1- Problem Recognition & Acceptance 2- Openness to Change 3- Locus of Control 4- Decision-Making Influences 5- Emotional Intelligence & Regulation 6- Motivation & Resilience  Hope this clarifies.  Regards

Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello CryptoTonyBTC,  Thank you for the question.  Virtual Rehab has been established since 2017. Our focus has been on the Business-to-Business (B2B) market since the get-go. We are now looking to expand into the Business-to-Consumer (B2C) market.  Virtual Rehab's evidence-based solution leverages the advancements in virtual reality, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technologies for psychological rehabilitation of vulnerable populations (pain management, prevention of substance use disorders, enhancement of autistic individuals’ communication skills, and rehabilitation of repeat offenders).  Virtual Rehab is addressing a very serious problem. Below are some of the key statistics:  - 1 in 4 people will be affected by mental or neurological disorder at some point in their lives - Around 450 million suffer today — placing mental disorders among leading causes of ill-health and disability - More than 20% of adults (aged 60+) suffer from mental or neurological disorder (that is more than 400 million by 2050) - Alcohol and Substance Use account for 5.4% of world’s total percentage of disease - Globally, 39 deaths per 100 000 population are attributable to Alcohol and illicit Drug use - Drug & Alcohol relapse statistics may reach up to 90% following a period of recovery - In the U.S. alone, 116 million adults struggle with chronic pain at a cost of $635 billion in lost productivity and treatment - In 2012, healthcare providers wrote 259 million prescriptions for painkillers. Note that 100 people die every day due to opioid drug overdoses - Close to 800 000 commit suicide annually - 300 million are affected by depression - 1 in 160 children has an autism spectrum disorder (ASD) - In the U.S. alone, 66% of released offenders recidivize within 3 years and 77% within 5 years - Lack of focus on mental health & psychological well-being  Hope this helps.  Regards

Author: rwahidy
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Thanks CjMapope for your comment and glad you enjoyed your own joke.  The reason why the account is categorized as a newbie (per the moderator's explanation) is a result of the numerous updates posted by the team in the same day and as part of the same thread, which could ultimately lead to this result. If you have any issues with these rules, kindly feel free to raise to Bitcointalk directly.  We are not here to entertain nor are we here to just post random comments. We are here on a mission and we have enough valuable supporters.  Should you believe that what we are sharing is irrelevant, then we invite you to leave this forum. Our global awards, recognition by the US, Canadian, United Nations authorities (along with others), as well as being covered by the media by over 28 countries worldwide speaks for itself (loud and clear). And just in case you didn't know, we hit our soft cap as part of the private sale. So, I ask you to immediately STOP spreading FUD.  There are numerous projects out there for your entertainment.  Thanks once again for dropping by. We appreciate your time and your comments.

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Thank you rwahidy for your continued support. We appreciate it.  CjMapope, we are sorry that you find our posts being of no value. We encourage to look at the history of this thread and you will see the level of engagement we have. Kindly also note that we are less concerned with creating a hype, pump and dump, and so forth, and more concerned with making a difference in this world - something that might not be very appealing to everyone out there - which we can appreciate and can understand.  However, in any case, and as rightly stated by rwahidy, we are here on a social mission to push further all the successes which we have realized over the past couple of years. Virtual Rehab is focused more on introducing positive change to society and helping the most vulnerable populations out there - something which we have extremely well over the past couple of years and will continue to do so for years to come.  We invite you to learn more about our work and maybe, you will find more value in what we do. Having said that, we respect your views, and thank you for taking the time to drop by and comment.  Wishing you a  great weekend.

Author: vabchgent
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Is virtual rehab for people with psychological issues that can remotely be dealt with? What if any medication is required for them?

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello vabchgent,  Thank you for the question.  In our current operations, which is Business-to-Business (B2B), patients must visit a rehab center, a hospital, or a correctional facility, which have acquired our services in order to get access to the Virtual Rehab solution.  In the future model, by end of 2019, we will make our solution available to end-users from the comfort of wherever they are.  In both cases, we strongly recommend the use of our solution along with any consultation or medication which have been prescribed by psychologists, therapists, or medical doctors to maximize the efficacy of our solution.  As per the FDA, the combination of both traditional therapy with the latest and greatest technology (including VR and AI) results in higher success rates versus the traditional ones.  Hope this helps address your question. Thank you once again for dropping us a note.

Author: TATI13
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: In my opinion an excellent assessment, I recommend that you pay attention to this project. ICO Analysis: Virtual Rehab Published on September 15, 2018 By Daniel Won Proof: https://hacked.com/ico-analysis-virtual-rehab/  Team: Dr. Raji Wahidy – Founder and CEO. Spent 9 years in different leadership roles at telecommunications giant, Vodafone Enterprise. He spent 4.5 years manager at Ericsson Canada. Founded and successfully exited Amalana in 2012. Registered UN and UNICEF volunteer, and has received 16 global enterprise achievement awards. Amal Azzeh – Co-Founder and CFO. 40+ years of experience in finance. She co-founded My Recruiting Team in 2016, a platform better known for its first-to-market Recruitment Helpdesk Support Services. No other work history is available on LinkedIn. Jean Speville – Chief Mind Technologist.Four years as Senior Service Engineer at ASUS. Founded Vessla Development in 2015. Vessla recently created a completely cordless IoT screen with built-in WiFi. It consumes 99% less energy than LCD & LED screens. He’s a member of The Verizon Innovation Program in San Francisco, an Alumni of the Microsoft Accelerator Bootcamp Program, and a member of Sting Accelerate (Swedish #1 incubator for tech startups They also list three consultants, including Pankaj Jain, who has worked for Nokia, AerNow, and Tivo inc There are ten advisors. Instead of listing them all, we’ve highlighted some of the companies they have previously held high positions at: MEDNAX, HHS, SAMHSA, Microsoft, Kaiser Permanente, AIG, J.P. Morgan-Chase, MixERP, Ammeris  Verdict “Virtual Rehab’s evidence-based solution leverages the advancements in virtual reality, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technologies for pain management, prevention of substance use disorders, and rehabilitation of repeat offenders.” And that’s just the tip of the iceberg. They will be getting into formal education as well as vocational training videos. Auto Mechanic, plumbing, how to properly putt a golfball… the possibilities are endless. On a recent Building The Future podcast, CEO Dr Raji talked about how he has had conversations with the Canadian Space Agency, who have been thinking of using VR for astronauts.  Risks     The ability to fully provide privacy, security and scaling is not there yet on the Ethereum blockchain. -2     The $20 million hardcap is rather high. This could cause a selloff early when this hits exchanges if demand isn’t there yet. -1     They are giving out $150,000 worth of VTR tokens during their ico bounty marketing campaign.  Their telegram has 18,500 members, 15,000 of them are either human or bot, there only for the bounty, not for the love. -1     The roadmap makes bold, unrealistic, claims, such as VTH will be listed on a top 10 exchange in Q1, and another top 10 exchange in Q2, and yet another top 10 exchange Q3. -2  Growth Potential     The team has connections to the UN, UNICEF, and 3 big accelerator/incubator programs. +2     First mover advantage (Addiction and Corrections). +1     Existing partnerships with Causalius, Chains International, Command Sourcing, Innovative Prison Systems, NETE, and Netswitch Technology Management. +2     Virtual Rehab will charge users for hardware, software licenses, programming required, and any support required. According to CEO, the total bill is still about 15% of the cost institutions pay now. +2     Unlimited expansion opportunities. PTSD, anxiety, autism, formal education, vocational training…+2     Dr Wahidy (Founder/CEO) just got awarded “Expert” status by the United Nations Global SCP program. This will open a ton of doors around the world. +4     Not much competition yet.+1  Disposition Definitely keep this one on your radar, huge potential. 7/10  Investment Details     Symbol: VRH     Platform: Ethereum     Private Sale: ongoing     Presale: Nov 1st- Nov 14th (15-30% bonus)     Crowdsale: Nov 15- Dec 14th     Total Supply: 400,000,000 (400m)     Amount for Sale: 240,000,000 (240m)     Price: $0.10     Soft cap: $5 million     Hard cap: $20 million

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello Dasengineer,  Hope you are well and thank you for the question.  There are four different use cases for the $VRH token. Please find these below:  - Allows users to order and download programs from Virtual Rehab Online Portal - Allows users to request additional analysis (using Virtual Rehab unique expert system, which uses Artificial Intelligence) of executed programs - Incentivizes users with $VRH tokens reward for seeking help and counselling from medical doctors, psychologists, and therapists (Proof of Therapy) - Allows users to pay for services received at the Virtual Rehab Therapy Center (VRTC)  Hence, there are clearly very good reasons why a user or a patient would want to hold a $VRH token. However, happy to answer any questions around that following your review of these use cases.  Our Private Sale will commence in the first week of October. We will make an official announcement once it officially begins.  All bonuses are locked for 3 months for private and non-private investors as well.  Thanks again for your questions and for your support.  Regards

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello svilluti,  Thank you for your comment.  A good place to start is with our white paper. Kindly take the time to read through it and you will better understand our work. We are happy to respond to any areas of ambiguity following your review.  Please find below a summary of our work:  Virtual Rehab's evidence-based solution leverages the advancements in virtual reality, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technologies for pain management, prevention of substance use disorders, and rehabilitation of repeat offenders. Our all-encompassing solution currently serves the B2B market (Rehab Centers, Hospitals, Correctional Departments, etc.). In addition, post-ICO, using blockchain technology, we will also be able to reach out to these vulnerable populations directly (B2C market), to offer help and to offer incentives through the use of Virtual Rehab's ERC20 $VRH utility token.  Virtual Reality - A virtual simulation of the real world using cognitive behavior and exposure therapy to trigger and to cope with temptations.  Artificial Intelligence - A unique expert system to identify areas of risk, to make treatment recommendations, and to predict post-therapy behavior  Now with respect to why blockchain?  We have actually written an extensive article on this subject - and since we did, we have gained even more traction and have become a top writer on Medium as folks can even more relate to what we are venturing on. Kindly see below the link to the Medium article:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/why-does-virtual-rehab-need-a-blockchain-1df016b37612  In a nutshell:  - Blockchain will allow us to enter into another market sector (B2C) - As of today, vulnerable population lack the privacy and the protection of all data and all information pertaining to them - which unfortunately, prevents them from progressing forward in life (getting another chance) or even re-integrating back into society. With blockchain, we will be able to ensure the complete protection and the complete privacy of these vulnerable populations (as we do not gather any personal data) and in a decentralized manner.  Our $VRH utility token has 4 clear use cases:  1- It will allow users to order and download programs straight from our Virtual Rehab Online Portal 2- It will allow users to request further analysis of the executed programs through our Virtual Rehab Online Portal. These programs will then be run through our unique expert system, which leverages Artificial Intelligence, in order to identify areas of risk, make treatment recommendation (along with any prescribed medication), and predict the future behavior of the user post therapy session 3- We are also introducing something that we are extremely excited about, which is “Proof of Therapy”. Yes. That is correct. If the user actually proves to us that he or she has sought help and counseling from a medical doctor, psychologist, or therapist in order to improve their mental health and psychological well-being, then we will reward him or her with $VRH tokens, which the user can claim straight from our Virtual Rehab Online Portal. The user can then trade these $VRH tokens on exchanges for $$ or use these tokens to purchase additional services from our the portal. 4- Users will be allowed to pay with $VRH for the rehabilitation services offered by the Virtual Rehab Therapy Center (which would include both traditional medical therapy along with VR, AI, and blockchain technologies). We are positive that you would appreciate the cost associated with the creation of several Virtual Rehab Therapy Centers.  We also suggest that you read the below Medium article which explains in more detail our business model:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/understanding-the-virtual-rehab-business-model-381b3831bcf0  Kindly also find below some of our notable successes since our inception:  - Evidence-based solution with proven efficacy results approved by physicians, psychologists, and therapists - 87% of participating patients have shown an overall improvement across various metrics - Described by US Digital Government Head as a “capability that is very very promising for public services” - Only VR/AI company included in the US Department of Justice, Institute of Corrections Environmental Scan report - Partnership agreements in-place across the North America, Europe, Middle East, and APAC regions - Only company to represent Canada as part of the Canadian Delegation to Arab Health - Selected as one of Canada’s most promising high-growth life sciences companies (Dose of the Valley, CA) - Featured by Microsoft’s leadership team at the Microsoft Inspire Innovation Session - Nominated by The Wall Street Journal for the WSJ D.LIVE Startup Showcase (Laguna Beach, CA) - Ranked by Spanish media as the first option for training correctional officers and rehabilitation of offenders using virtual reality - Featured by the media across 28 countries worldwide  Thank you once again for your question and we hope that you will take the time to read through the white paper and come back with any questions you may have.  Regards

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello Jeff Crus,  Hope you are well. Thank you for your questions.  Kindly find below our responses:  1. Virtual Rehab's evidence-based solution leverages the advancements in virtual reality, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technologies for pain management, prevention of substance use disorders, and rehabilitation of repeat offenders.  The Global Problem can be summarized as per the below:  - Alcohol and Substance Use account for 5.4% of world’s total percentage of disease - Globally, 39 deaths per 100 000 population are attributable to Alcohol and illicit Drug use - Drug & Alcohol relapse statistics may reach up to 90% following a period of recovery - In the U.S. alone, 116 million adults struggle with chronic pain at a cost of $635 billion in lost productivity and treatment - In 2012, healthcare providers wrote 259 million prescriptions for painkillers. Note that 100 people die every day due to opioid drug overdoses - In the U.S. alone, 66% of released offenders recidivize within 3 years and 77% within 5 years - Lack of focus on mental health & psychological well-being  2. The Virtual Rehab team is rich with experience, global awards and recognition, and breadth of network. All team members are verifiable and LinkedIn provided here below along with numerous media coverage, live interviews, and podcasts conducted by the team. Kindly find below the detail of each team member:  Dr. Raji Wahidy - Founder & CEO https://www.linkedin.com/in/rajiwahidy/  15+ years of experience with world’s most renowned organizations (Ericsson & Vodafone) Global Multinational Awards Entrepreneur with 1 exit for Amalana – Global Networking Services Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering (Telecommunications), master’s degree in Quality Systems Engineering and Business Administration (Procurement & Supply Chain Management), and doctorate degree in Management (Organizational Leadership) Registered UN and UNICEF volunteer Actively involved within the blockchain industry since 2013  Mrs. Amal Azzeh - Co-Founder & CFO https://www.virtualrehab.co/employees/amal-azzeh/  40+ years of experience in Finance Operations Strong financial and operational background Led global teams and delivered to organizational goals under budget Global Excellence Awards Co-Founder of MRT (tech-driven operational company). Was responsible for the introduction and operationalization of the first ever recruitment helpdesk  Jean Speville - Chief Mind Technologist https://www.linkedin.com/in/speville/  Nominated for Innovators Under 35 Europe Awards by MIT Technology Review (2017 & 2018) Impact entrepreneur, biohacker, and mindfulness practitioner Member of The Verizon Innovation Program in San Francisco Alumni Author: Hart-James
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Good day, Guys, just can your project be explained in < 60 seconds? And what purpose does the blockchain have in your plan? What role does the coin have? Thanks

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello Hart-James,  Thank you for your comment and we appreciate your interest in Virtual Rehab.  Virtual Rehab's evidence-based solution leverages the advancements in virtual reality, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technologies for pain management, prevention of substance use disorders, and rehabilitation of repeat offenders. Our all-encompassing solution currently serves the B2B market (Rehab Centers, Hospitals, Correctional Departments, etc.). In addition, post-ICO, using blockchain technology, we will also be able to reach out to these vulnerable populations directly (B2C market), to offer help and to offer incentives through the use of Virtual Rehab's ERC20 $VRH utility token.  Now with respect to the great question you asked - why blockchain?  We have actually written an extensive article on this subject - and since we did, we have gained even more traction and have become a top writer on Medium as folks can even more relate to what we are venturing on. Kindly see below the link to the Medium article:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/why-does-virtual-rehab-need-a-blockchain-1df016b37612  In a nutshell:  - Blockchain will allow us to enter into another market sector (B2C) - As of today, vulnerable population lack the privacy and the protection of all data and all information pertaining to them - which unfortunately, prevents them from progressing forward in life (getting another chance) or even re-integrating back into society. With blockchain, we will be able to ensure the complete protection and the complete privacy of these vulnerable populations (as we do not gather any personal data) and in a decentralized manner.  Our $VRH utility token has 3 clear use cases:  1- It will allow users to order and download programs straight from our Virtual Rehab Online Portal 2- It will allow users to request further analysis of the executed programs through our Virtual Rehab Online Portal. These programs will then be run through our unique expert system, which leverages Artificial Intelligence, in order to identify areas of risk, make treatment recommendation (along with any prescribed medication), and predict the future behavior of the user post therapy session 3- Last, but definitely not least, and something that we are extremely excited about is “Proof of Therapy”. Yes. That is correct. If the user actually proves to us that he or she has sought help and counseling from a medical doctor, psychologist, or therapist in order to improve their mental health and psychological well-being, then we will reward him or her with $VRH tokens, which the user can claim straight from our Virtual Rehab Online Portal. The user can then trade these $VRH tokens on exchanges for $$ or use these tokens to purchase additional services from our the portal.  We also suggest that you read the below Medium article which explains in more detail our business model:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/understanding-the-virtual-rehab-business-model-381b3831bcf0  Thank you once again for your great questions and for your support.  Regards

Body: Thanks minreeme for your question. We appreciate it.  From a privacy perspective, Virtual Rehab's efforts will be in terms of protecting all the data and the information pertaining to the user/patient accordingly. In other words, we will not be collecting their first name or last name. However, we will be collecting all data and all information resulting from the user/patient's decision making, actions, and reactions along with their biometrics (heart rate, blood pressure, eye-tracking, and biodermal activity) in order to further allow us and others around the world to leverage this data and this information to conduct further research around ways of improving an individual's mental health and psychological well-being.  Thanks again for your question and kindly do not hesitate to let us know should you have any further questions.  Regards

However, the current offering is now only to Business-2-Business (B2B) clients (Rehab Centers, Hospitals, and Correctional Departments). However, we would not expect it to surpass $100 per session (and it would be of course, cheaper when using $VRH tokens versus fiat, as a form of payment). Having said that, given the market dynamics and current pricing, we are very positive that our offering will be extremely competitive.  Finally, your comments about the website are spot on. We are currently undergoing a makeover and a brand new website is set for release by end of September. We will move away from the corporate structure and make it more appealing. We hope that you will like it.  Thank you very much for your important questions. Kindly do not hesitate to let us know should you have any further questions.  Regards

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello doge_shit666,  Thank you for the kind feedback and thank you as well for this great and very important question.  The answer is absolutely. All our programs are tailored to the specific condition and the specific situation that the user/patient is dealing with. Therefore, it would only make sense to have them customized accordingly.  Thanks again for your support. Much appreciated.  Regards

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hello christopher-dinh,  Thank you for your comment and we appreciate your interest in Virtual Rehab.  Virtual Rehab's evidence-based solution leverages the advancements in virtual reality, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technologies for pain management, prevention of substance use disorders, and rehabilitation of repeat offenders. Our all-encompassing solution currently serves the B2B market (Rehab Centers, Hospitals, Correctional Departments, etc.). In addition, post-ICO, using blockchain technology, we will also be able to reach out to these vulnerable populations directly (B2C market), to offer help and to offer incentives through the use of Virtual Rehab's ERC20 $VRH utility token.  Now with respect to the great question you asked - why blockchain?  We have actually written an extensive article on this subject - and since we did, we have gained even more traction and have become a top writer on Medium as folks can even more relate to what we are venturing on. Kindly see below the link to the Medium article:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/why-does-virtual-rehab-need-a-blockchain-1df016b37612  In a nutshell:  - Blockchain will allow us to enter into another market sector (B2C) - As of today, vulnerable population lack the privacy and the protection of all data and all information pertaining to them - which unfortunately, prevents them from progressing forward in life (getting another chance) or even re-integrating back into society. With blockchain, we will be able to ensure the complete protection and the complete privacy of these vulnerable populations (as we do not gather any personal data) and in a decentralized manner.  Our $VRH utility token has 3 clear use cases:  1- It will allow users to order and download programs straight from our Virtual Rehab Online Portal 2- It will allow users to request further analysis of the executed programs through our Virtual Rehab Online Portal. These programs will then be run through our unique expert system, which leverages Artificial Intelligence, in order to identify areas of risk, make treatment recommendation (along with any prescribed medication), and predict the future behavior of the user post therapy session 3- Last, but definitely not least, and something that we are extremely excited about is “Proof of Therapy”. Yes. That is correct. If the user actually proves to us that he or she has sought help and counseling from a medical doctor, psychologist, or therapist in order to improve their mental health and psychological well-being, then we will reward him or her with $VRH tokens, which the user can claim straight from our Virtual Rehab Online Portal. The user can then trade these $VRH tokens on exchanges for $$ or use these tokens to purchase additional services from our the portal.  We also suggest that you read the below Medium article which explains in more detail our business model:  https://medium.com/@VirtualRehab/understanding-the-virtual-rehab-business-model-381b3831bcf0  Thank you once again for your great questions and for your support.  Regards

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Great Question Big Sharky. The length of the experience is very much dependent upon the user who is going through the experience and how comfortable they are with the Virtual Reality system. Having said that, it would take no less than 15-20 minutes and could go up to an hour. However, as per medical advice, we recommend that users do not spend more than 30-45 minutes performing the activity on a single day. We also recommend that this activity would be performed with one day break in between each experience.

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Virtual Rehab's evidence-based solution leverages the advancements in virtual reality, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technologies for pain management, prevention of substance use disorders, and rehabilitation of repeat offenders.  Every person in life deserves a second chance. Substance use addicts along with offenders are no exception to this rule. In fact, they are the ones that are in most dire need for help, support, and development to become improved citizens upon their release from rehab centers, hospitals, and prisons. This can only be realized through correctional and rehabilitation programs that will prepare them to lead their future lives in a positive manner in order to avoid the possibility of repeated offenses and substance use addiction.  There are approximately 255 million suffering from substance abuse and roughly $100 billion are being spent on addiction treatment worldwide. In addition, according to the International Centre for Prison Studies, the global prison population is currently set at 10.5 million. Prison budgets are also currently set at roughly $35.2 billion dollars worldwide. These numbers are huge and both costly to the governments, tax payers, and society as a whole.  At Virtual Rehab, our innovative and powerful solution is intended to rehabilitate rather than just punish. The scope of our solution includes psychological and correctional rehabilitation. Virtual Rehab’s services extend to hospitals, rehab centers, correctional officers, inmates, along with other verticals. Furthermore, using blockchain technology, we can now reach out to those vulnerable populations directly, to offer help and reward, by empowering them with the use of Virtual Rehab's ERC-20 VRH Token within our network.  Virtual Rehab believes that putting a kid in the corner does not teach them how to be a better person but rather teaches them not to get caught. Therefore, we are in it for the social good and to help address the needs of the most vulnerable populations out there.

Body: The only reason we will start in Europe is due to the fact that there is also a serious problem over there and the fact that Virtual Rehab's HQ will be in Estonia, so it would make sense to launch close to the HQ. Moreover, Europe is quite well-known to be adopting new technologies quicker than North America.  Having said that, we will assess and make a decision on the location once we have reached consensus on this. Rest assured that we will make an official announcement once the decision has been made along with a clear explanation as to why we have chosen that location.

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Thanks for the great question.  The $VRH utility token has 3 distinct use cases:  1- It will allow users to order and download programs from our Virtual Rehab Online portal 2- Users will be able to request further analysis of the executed programs through our unique expert system (which uses AI) to identify areas of risk, make treatment recommendation along with any medication prescribed by the medical doctor, psychologist, or therapist, and predict the future behavior post therapy 3- (the use case we are most excited about) - in case the user proves to us that they have sought therapy from a medical doctor, psychologist, or therapist, they will then be rewarded with $VRH tokens which they can then trade on exchanges or use to order more services. Therefore, it becomes an incentive to allow them to improve their mental health and psychological well-being

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: The recording is stored and can then be used to have a meaningful discussion with the therapist or psychologist accordingly. So, instead of sitting down and getting drilled by a psychologist, we are putting the user in a state-of-mind where they are more comfortable and can share more information at ease about themselves and what are they thinking about and how they are feeling.

Author: CryptoTonyBTC
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: That very impressive.  Can you tell why blockchain

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Great question. As you probably know, we are dealing with vulnerable populations. Unfortunately, all data and all information pertaining to these vulnerable populations is completely exposed as of today. This prevents these folks from getting a second chance and re-integrating back into society. With blockchain, we will be able to provide complete protection and privacy to all data and all information of these users and moreover in a decentralized manner.  Also, please note that the blockchain will allow us to take our existing model from B2B to B2C. Hence it will allow us to serve a larger population and make an even bigger positive impact within our society.  Finally, the $VRH utility will only be possible through the use of the blockchain. Hope this makes sense.

Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Very good question. In fact, I was asked about that in my interview with "The Bad Crypto Podcast". This could very well be the case that they start off by doing it for the money. But that's just like anything in life. There are many situations where we are forced to do things that we don't want to do. However, after a while, we get used to it.  This is no different. We strongly believe and it has been medically proven that the more you do something the more you get accustomed to it after a while.  So, they may start by doing it for the money, and they are still going to the medical doctor, therapist, or psychologist for visit and to open up about their problems. Hence, they will still benefit accordingly. With time, this will help their psychological well-being as well.

Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥

Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Absolutely. All programs are developed in-house and in partnership with our partners. Throughout the life-cycle of the program development, we are actively working with psychologist and therapists to ensure that the programs being developed are fit-for-purpose. In fact, even prior to the development, we ensure that the psychologist or the therapist approved the scenario for development.

Author: BigSharky
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Why do they need to approve it in advance? What do they approve?

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Hi BigSharky,  Thanks for the question.  They need to approve it in advance to ensure that we have included all the triggers and cues which will challenge the patient within that scenario.  Let's say the patient has a DUI, then we would ensure, with the help of the therapist, that within the experience that the patient goes through, he or she is subjected to temptations such as alcohol in a store or in a home or people drinking in a gathering and being offered to drink along with them. We measure the action and reaction to these temptations. Therefore, we work closely with the therapists to ensure that these temptations are available within our programs and increase their level of difficulty as the patient gets more comfortable with the specific scenario.  Hope this clarifies.  Regards

Author: BigSharky
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: so there are different levels of difficulties?

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: That is correct. The more the user gets comfortable with the program, we increase the level of difficulty to challenge them even more.

Author: BigSharky
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥

Author: BigSharky
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: What data do you gather ?

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: 1- Data gathered from the user experience throughout the Virtual Reality scenario (i.e. their actions and reactions along with any voice records which may have been captured throughout this experience) 2- Biometrics (heart rate, blood pressure, biodermal activity, and eye-tracking)

Author: TonyHernan
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Sorry but what did you mean by voice records?

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Thank you for the question.  Within the experience, we sometimes capture the responses that users provide in a voice format. For example, in one of our programs, at some point in the scenario, the user is subjected to a series of questions to try to determine what their situation would be in the future should they not decide to change. How would that impact their family, finance, relationships, etc. All of these are recorded vocally, and the user is given 30 seconds to record their responses.

Author: VirtualRehab
Title: 🔥🔥🔥 [OCT 2-12 on LIQUID EXCHANGE] Virtual Rehab - $VRH - Mental Health 🔥🔥🔥
Body: Virtual Rehab's evidence-based solution leverages the advancements in virtual reality, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technologies for pain management, prevention of substance use disorders, and rehabilitation of repeat offenders.  Every person in life deserves a second chance. Substance use addicts along with offenders are no exception to this rule. In fact, they are the ones that are in most dire need for help, support, and development to become improved citizens upon their release from rehab centers, hospitals, and prisons. This can only be realized through correctional and rehabilitation programs that will prepare them to lead their future lives in a positive manner in order to avoid the possibility of repeated offenses and substance use addiction.  There are approximately 255 million suffering from substance abuse and roughly $100 billion are being spent on addiction treatment worldwide. In addition, according to the International Centre for Prison Studies, the global prison population is currently set at 10.5 million. Prison budgets are also currently set at roughly $35.2 billion dollars worldwide. These numbers are huge and both costly to the governments, tax payers, and society as a whole.  At Virtual Rehab, our innovative and powerful solution is intended to rehabilitate rather than just punish. The scope of our solution includes psychological and correctional rehabilitation. Virtual Rehab’s services extend to hospitals, rehab centers, correctional officers, inmates, along with other verticals. Furthermore, using blockchain technology, we can now reach out to those vulnerable populations directly, to offer help and reward, by empowering them with the use of Virtual Rehab's ERC-20 VRH Token within our network.  Virtual Rehab believes that putting a kid in the corner does not teach them how to be a better person but rather teaches them not to get caught. Therefore, we are in it for the social good and to help address the needs of the most vulnerable populations out there.
